title: Will the S&P 500 Crash in 2026? History Offers a Strikingly Clear Answer.
title_zh: 标准普尔 500 指数会在 2026 年崩盘吗？历史提供了极其明确的答案。
summary: In spite of market gains, one thing has weighed on investors' minds in recent months.
summary_zh: 尽管市场上涨，但近几个月来有一件事一直困扰着投资者。

title: Salesforce Expands Into Defense And Wildfire AI With Long Term Deals
title_zh: Salesforce 通过长期交易扩展到国防和野火人工智能领域
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) secured a US$5.6b, 10 year contract with the U.S. Army to support digital modernization and AI enablement. The company also launched EMBERPOINT LLC, a wildfire response venture with Lockheed Martin, PG&E, and Wells Fargo.
summary_zh: Salesforce（纽约证券交易所股票代码：CRM）与美国陆军签订了一份价值 5.6 亿美元、为期 10 年的合同，以支持数字现代化和人工智能支持。该公司还与洛克希德·马丁公司、PG&E 和富国银行合作成立了 EMBERPOINT LLC，这是一家野火应对企业。

title: Bristol-Myers Squibb Expands Cancer Efforts With New AI And Drug Deals
title_zh: 百时美施贵宝通过新的人工智能和药物交易扩大抗癌努力
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb (NYSE:BMY) has entered a new collaboration with Microsoft to use AI for earlier lung cancer detection, with a focus on underserved communities.
summary_zh: 百时美施贵宝（纽约证券交易所股票代码：BMY）已与微软达成新的合作，利用人工智能进行早期肺癌检测，重点关注服务不足的社区。

title: Amazon’s Potential US$50b OpenAI Deal And What It Means For Investors
title_zh: 亚马逊潜在的 500 亿美元 OpenAI 交易及其对投资者意味着什么
summary: Amazon.com (NasdaqGS:AMZN) is reportedly in advanced talks to invest up to US$50b in OpenAI. The potential deal would be part of a wider US$100b funding round for OpenAI. CEO Andy Jassy is said to be directly involved in discussions with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman.
summary_zh: 据报道，亚马逊 (NasdaqGS:AMZN) 正在就向 OpenAI 投资最多 500 亿美元进行深入谈判。这笔潜在交易将成为 OpenAI 一轮更广泛的 1000 亿美元融资的一部分。据称，首席执行官 Andy Jassy 直接参与了与 OpenAI 首席执行官 Sam...

title: Microsoft’s US$750m Perplexity Deal And What It Means For Azure Valuation
title_zh: 微软 7.5 亿美元的 Perplexity 交易及其对 Azure 估值的影响
summary: Microsoft, ticker NasdaqGS:MSFT, signed a three year, US$750 million Azure agreement with AI startup Perplexity. Perplexity plans to deploy models from OpenAI, Anthropic, and xAI through Microsoft Foundry as part of a multi cloud setup.
summary_zh: 微软（股票代码 NasdaqGS：MSFT）与人工智能初创公司 Perplexity 签署了一份为期三年、价值 7.5 亿美元的 Azure 协议。 Perplexity 计划通过 Microsoft Foundry 部署 OpenAI、Anthropic 和 xAI 的模...
